languages.text: "Признаться, он меня приятно удивил. Я ожидал чего-то менее цивилизованного, учитывая, что Простор Коронус — это окраина Империума. Но Даргонус мог бы потягаться в статусе и стабильности с некоторыми мирами Каликсиса".

"I must admit, I was pleasantly surprised. I had expected something far less civilised, given that the Koronus Expanse is on the outskirts of the Imperium. Instead, Dargonus may even compare to some Calixian worlds in status and stability."
languages.original_text: "Признаться, он меня приятно удивил. Я ожидал чего-то менее цивилизованного, учитывая, что Простор Коронус — это окраина Империума. Но Даргонус мог бы потягаться в статусе и стабильности с некоторыми мирами Каликсиса".

"I must admit, I was pleasantly surprised. I had expected something far less civilised, given that the Koronus Expanse is on the outskirts of the Imperium. Instead, Dargonus may even compare to some Calixian worlds in status and stability."

languages.text: 「率直に言うと、良い意味で驚かされました。コロヌス・エクスパンスが帝国の辺境にあることを考えて、もっと野蛮な場所だと思っていました。ですが、ダルゴナスはキャリクシス星域のいくつかの惑星と比べても、地位や安定性において遜色がないかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "I must admit, I was pleasantly surprised. I had expected something far less civilised, given that the Koronus Expanse is on the outskirts of the Imperium. Instead, Dargonus may even compare to some Calixian worlds in status and stability."

traits.locale_text: 「率直に言うと、良い意味で驚かされました。コロヌス・エクスパンスが帝国の辺境にあることを考えて、もっと野蛮な場所だと思っていました。ですが、ダルゴナスはキャリクシス星域のいくつかの惑星と比べても、地位や安定性において遜色がないかもしれません」

languages.text: "Ich muss zugeben, ich war angenehm überrascht. Ich hatte etwas deutlich weniger Zivilisiertes erwartet, weil die Koronus-Ausdehnung doch im Außenbereich des Imperiums liegt. Stattdessen kann Dargonus sich durchaus mit einigen Calixis-Welten vergleichen, was Status und Stabilität angeht."
languages.original_text: "I must admit, I was pleasantly surprised. I had expected something far less civilised, given that the Koronus Expanse is on the outskirts of the Imperium. Instead, Dargonus may even compare to some Calixian worlds in status and stability."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss zugeben, ich war angenehm überrascht. Ich hatte etwas deutlich weniger Zivilisiertes erwartet, weil die Koronus-Ausdehnung doch im Außenbereich des Imperiums liegt. Stattdessen kann Dargonus sich durchaus mit einigen Calixis-Welten vergleichen, was Status und Stabilität angeht."

languages.text: « Je dois admettre avoir été agréablement surpris. Je m'attendais à un lieu bien moins civilisé, les Étendues de Koronus se situant si loin du cœur de l'Imperium. Mais j'ai découvert une planète qui n'a rien à envier à d'autres mondes de Calixis en termes de statut ou de stabilité. »
languages.original_text: "I must admit, I was pleasantly surprised. I had expected something far less civilised, given that the Koronus Expanse is on the outskirts of the Imperium. Instead, Dargonus may even compare to some Calixian worlds in status and stability."

traits.locale_text: « Je dois admettre avoir été agréablement surpris. Je m'attendais à un lieu bien moins civilisé, les Étendues de Koronus se situant si loin du cœur de l'Imperium. Mais j'ai découvert une planète qui n'a rien à envier à d'autres mondes de Calixis en termes de statut ou de stabilité. »

languages.text: «Admito que me he llevado una grata sorpresa. Habida cuenta de que la Extensión de Koronus se halla en los confines del Imperium, esperaba algo mucho menos civilizado. Y sin embargo, encuentro que Dargonus es comparable a algunos mundos calixianos en prestigio y estabilidad».
languages.original_text: "I must admit, I was pleasantly surprised. I had expected something far less civilised, given that the Koronus Expanse is on the outskirts of the Imperium. Instead, Dargonus may even compare to some Calixian worlds in status and stability."

traits.locale_text: «Admito que me he llevado una grata sorpresa. Habida cuenta de que la Extensión de Koronus se halla en los confines del Imperium, esperaba algo mucho menos civilizado. Y sin embargo, encuentro que Dargonus es comparable a algunos mundos calixianos en prestigio y estabilidad».

languages.text: “不得不说，达戈努斯令我感到惊喜。考虑到科罗努斯扩区位于帝国边缘区域，我本以为那里会是个不怎么发达的区域，但实际上却恰恰相反。就文明与稳定程度而言，达戈努斯甚至可以与卡利西斯的部分世界相提并论。”
languages.original_text: "I must admit, I was pleasantly surprised. I had expected something far less civilised, given that the Koronus Expanse is on the outskirts of the Imperium. Instead, Dargonus may even compare to some Calixian worlds in status and stability."

traits.locale_text: “不得不说，达戈努斯令我感到惊喜。考虑到科罗努斯扩区位于帝国边缘区域，我本以为那里会是个不怎么发达的区域，但实际上却恰恰相反。就文明与稳定程度而言，达戈努斯甚至可以与卡利西斯的部分世界相提并论。”

languages.text: "İtiraf etmeliyim ki hoş bir şaşkınlık içerisindeyim. Koronus Enginliği'nin İmparatorluk'un kenar mahallelerinde olmasından yola çıkarak medeniyetten daha uzak bir şey bekliyordum. Ancak Dargonus, statü ve istikrar açısından bazı Calixis dünyalarıyla bile yarışabilir."
languages.original_text: "I must admit, I was pleasantly surprised. I had expected something far less civilised, given that the Koronus Expanse is on the outskirts of the Imperium. Instead, Dargonus may even compare to some Calixian worlds in status and stability."
